task_goal: In app broccoli app, Create a new recipe for 'Broccoli Salad' with the following details: Category 'Salad', Description 'A healthy and delicious salad', Source 'Grandma's recipe book', Servings '4', Time '20 minutes', Ingredients 'Broccoli, mayonnaise, raisins, walnuts', Directions 'Mix all ingredients together and chill before serving'.
